name: Immortal Emperors Revenge: The Rise of Tianxuan Sect
author: UpdatingStatusOnGoingTypeManhua
content: One million years ago, the Immortal Emperor Su Xuan was killed by the otherworldly demons with the help of the six great immortal ancestors. Reborn in the lower realm, he founded the Tianxuan Sect and vowed to return to the immortal world for revenge. A million years have passed, and his disciples have ascended one after another, becoming dominant figures in the immortal realm. As for him, he has just ascended to the immortal world and is a novice. Su Xuan pretends to be foolish and plays the fo
